sentences.en: We sampled a selection of different bottled waters.
sentences.cn: 我们品尝了挑选出来的各种瓶装水。

sentences.en: Only drink bottled water and check the seal isn't broken.
sentences.cn: 只喝瓶装水，并且要看封口开了没有。

sentences.en: The selection of bottled beverages is distinctly top-shelf.
sentences.cn: 可选的瓶装饮料的都是上等的。
